amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase Administration account by $1 million to address environmental concerns in both urban and rural settings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
